name: FormulaTrack
description:
FormulaTrack is a topdown game and with a pixel art design, it's a game to have fun.
--------------------------

You will have to chain the circuits in order to beat to finish them and you will have to surpass yourself to beat the best scores.

FormulaTrack is a car game with circuits in the middle of a stadium. Each track is different and spiced with a touch of madness.

Features :

- A very difficult campaign with more than 15 circuits !!!
- an arcade mode to challenge those stronger than you, or you'll prove the opposite.
- A garage to choose the best skin for your car.
- Complete as many circuits as possible to unlock corners for your garage.

So get ready to drive on daring and vicious tracks !!!
